article.description: Tai Odiase scored 23 points, Jake Wiegand added 16 and Illinois-Chicago dominated the second half for a 96-58 win over Roosevelt on Tuesday.
article.headline: Illinois-Chicago heats up to whip Roosevelt 96-58
article.linkText: Illinois-Chicago heats up to whip Roosevelt 96-58
article.story: CHICAGO -- Tai Odiase scored 23 points, Jake Wiegand added 16 and Illinois-Chicago dominated the second half for a 96-58 win over Roosevelt on Tuesday. The NAIA Lakers had a 37-24 lead on a Damian Zalewski 3-pointer midway through the first half but the Flames steadily pulled away for a 49-37 advantage. The Flames (1-2) shot 50 percent -- 18 of 36 despite going 1 of 11 on 3-pointers -- then got hot in the second half, pounding the ball inside. In the opening minutes of the second half, Illinois-Chicago used a 14-0 run that pushed the lead to 69-40. The Flames had a 32-8 advantage on points in the paint and shot 59 percent. Julian Torres added 13 points and Dikembe Dixson had 15 rebounds as the Flames had a 54-30 advantage on the boards. Kevin Priebe had 12 points for the Lakers (3-5), who shot 21 percent in the second half and 31 percent for the game.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
